title: No New Mortal Kombat at Evo - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.02.22
description:
Greg and Blessing talk about what we could see at Evo, a new handheld coming from Logitech and Tencent, and Call of Duty losing Millions of players.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:53 - Housekeeping and The DCCW

The new Kinda Funny Podcast is up, and it’s all about Greg’s wild ride hosting WWE SummerSlam! Come for the stories about the Undertaker, Jerry The King Lawler, and Paul Heyman; stay for the video of Tim riding a mechanical bull! youtube.com/kindafunny


August’s Patreon Platinum Item has been revealed! - Designed and concepted by @PhillJWoodward!

The Roper Report  -

00:17:20 - Mortal Kombat 12 won’t be announced at EVO 2022
00:26:59 - Logitech is working with Tencent on a mysterious handheld
00:36:40 - AEW: Fight Forever listing reveals platforms, match types and more
00:48:48 - Ad
00:50:33 - Activision Blizzard Loses Millions of Players, But Adds 25% More Developers Year-on-Year
00:56:13 - Remedy Postpones Its First Multiplayer Game
00:59:18 - We are OFK is launching August 18th
01:05:00 - Out today
01:09:22 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless & Greg
